arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Rennes: Martin Satriano on bench, Khalis Merah starts
arts.sum: Olympique Lyonnais delivered a hefty blow to arch-rivals Olympique de Marseille before the international break, scoring late in regulation time to win the Choc des Olympiques. It’s been a flawless…

Rennes have picked up four points from a possible nine so far in Ligue 1. After winning their first game of the season, they followed that up with a draw and a loss. Lyon have enjoyed a perfect start...
